title: Pixel 3, Serviced twice back to back still OIS issue asking to send for third time.
content:
bad service and support. device returened after first service with OIS issue. raised the issue and asked to send it back, i have send all the detials video so nothing will be missed. again got the device back with citing everything ok. but still the same issue asking to send again for 3rd time within 2 months...
what is the logic in this
i am not using the device for 3 months, and each time support teams tells device goes thru many QC Test and it will be cleared. but no use
i am fed up sending device back and forth. how to fix
